# banner_seokxkyu

## **Overview**
`banner_seokxkyu` is a simple Python program that utilizes the `pyfiglet` library to generate and display banner text. The current version, `0.3.0`, features a single function that outputs a stylized "hello seokxkyu" message.

## **Installation**

To install the `banner_seokxkyu` package, ensure you have Python 3.9 or above installed. You can then install the package using the following command:

```sh
pip install banner_seokxkyu

```

## **Implementation**
```
$ Seokxkyu-banner
    __         ____                         __        __
   / /_  ___  / / /___     ________  ____  / /___  __/ /____  ____  __
  / __ \/ _ \/ / / __ \   / ___/ _ \/ __ \/ //_/ |/_/ //_/ / / / / / /
 / / / /  __/ / / /_/ /  (__  )  __/ /_/ / ,< _>  </ ,< / /_/ / /_/ /
/_/ /_/\___/_/_/\____/  /____/\___/\____/_/|_/_/|_/_/|_|\__, /\__,_/
                                                       /____/
```
